title: Technology-Enhanced Mathematics Learning Design for Adult Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (operations, functions, statistics) and work-related application experience
context.additional_context: Mathematics competency enhancement programs for in-service professionals' work efficiency improvement

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of statistical modeling using technology-based tools to effectively analyze work-related data.
Learners can collaborate with peers on social network platforms to share and evaluate mathematical problem-solving strategies.
Learners can write a case report applying mathematical theories acquired through podcast content to practical situations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
